alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; St. Charles; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern St. Charles, east central Lafourche, central Jefferson and western Plaquemines Parishes through 515 PM CDT... At 441 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Barataria, or 10 miles northeast of Larose, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jean Lafitte, Barataria and Lafitte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; St. Charles; Upper Lafourche
